title: Optimize your taxes

hero.title: When it comes to important decisions, the costliest mistake is getting it wrong.
hero.paragraph: That’s why our clients trust us from the start; getting it right the first time saves you time, money … and freedom.

block1.title: We turn complexity into strategy.
block1.paragraph: Making fiscal or legal decisions at an international level involves risks, changing regulations, and scenarios that are not always evident. At ELYSIUM, we analyze each case with a global vision to transform that complexity into a clear, safe and effective roadmap.

block2.title: We listen before proposing. We understand before acting.
block2.paragraph: We don't apply templates; we design tailored solutions considering your personal, fiscal, legal and business reality. Because every person and every business is unique and deserves a strategy that is too.

block3.title: Relationships that add long-term value.
block3.paragraph: Many come to ELYSIUM for a one-time service. But they stay for everything they discover afterward. Here we don't sell procedures but real solutions with legal, fiscal and strategic vision. The vast majority of our clients repeat or expand services. It's usual for them to return. It's exceptional for them not to.

block4.title: Excellence that shows in the details.
block4.paragraph: We don't aim to do 'the right thing': we aim to do it better. We come from top-tier firms and have learned that what makes the difference is not the big things but the precise ones. In every recommendation, document, or decision, our quality standard is present.

usp.optimize_tax: Do you want to optimize your taxation, protect your assets, and make decisions with peace of mind?
usp.help_do_it_right: At ELYSIUM we help you do it right, with legal guarantees and strategic vision. We know that taking the step to Andorra or rethinking your fiscal situation raises doubts:
usp.tax_doubts:
Will the Tax Agency come after me?
Will I have to completely sever ties with my country?
Will I really be able to improve my situation?
usp.client_goals:
Our clients not only want to pay less.
They want to do so legally and securely.
They want to continue managing their life and business with freedom.
And, above all, they want to live better, with control and peace of mind.

structuring_news.title: Structuring News
structuring_news.description: The good news is yes: it is possible to structure your case effectively, within the law, and without errors. We advise entrepreneurs, athletes, innovators, content creators, or investors who have started generating significant income and are looking for clarity, efficiency, and peace of mind in Andorra. With experience in leading firms and a global approach, we help you establish your tax residence, set up companies, or plan your assets with legal and long-term solutions.

cta.conversation_description: A confidential meeting to listen to you today. A trusted team to accompany you tomorrow.

hero.title: The experience is not just technical, it is personal
hero.paragraph: From Andorra to the world, a team united by excellence and passion.

hero.title: Knowledge for Decision-Making
hero.paragraph: Ideas, analysis, and strategies for entrepreneurs who want to grow, optimise, and make clear-sighted decisions.

whoWeAre.p1: At ELYSIUM, our philosophy rests on an unshakable premise: the client is at the heart of everything we do. Founded in the dynamic business hub of Escaldes (Principality of Andorra) and able to serve clients personally in Andorra, Barcelona and Toulouse, our international strategic-consulting firm not only pursues excellence—it redefines what 'advisory' means.
whoWeAre.p2: 'Building lasting partnerships' is more than a slogan; it reflects our commitment to forging durable, deeply trustworthy relationships. We specialise in international tax consulting and planning, business optimisation, international relocation and executive strategy, among other services. Our approach guarantees meticulous, personalised attention, treating each challenge as our own and delivering rapid, effective solutions.
whoWeAre.p3: Albert Contel, our Managing Partner and founder, embodies ELYSIUM’s values: honesty, transparency, technical rigour and unwavering attention to detail. With wide-ranging experience—from regulatory changes in Andorra and neighbouring countries to global standards—he has not only witnessed but helped shape the fiscal and legal landscape alongside numerous international clients. Likewise, the firm would be nothing without every member of its team: our diversity ensures a wealth of perspectives and a unique capacity to handle complex cases with a deep, nuanced grasp of global client needs.
whoWeAre.p4: True value lies not only in what we deliver but in how we deliver it. We focus on minimising risk and maximising opportunity, empowering clients as well as supporting them. Every member of our expert team—economists and lawyers specialised in commercial and tax law—ensures that only the best minds handle each case.
whoWeAre.p5: Our dynamic, ever-growing international network of collaborators lets us craft effective strategies across multiple jurisdictions and give clients a global view. From corporate restructuring to strategic planning and business valuation, every service comes with a proactive, tailored mindset.
whoWeAre.p6: In short, ELYSIUM is more than a consulting firm; we are a strategic partner dedicated to our clients’ growth and evolution. Born of a unique vision of exceptional service, we live to solve the most complex challenges and to see every business decision made with clarity, knowledge and confidence. With ELYSIUM you gain not just a consultant but an ally who deeply understands your needs and turns them into sustainable, successful opportunities.

history.title: History
history.origins: ELYSIUM’s journey begins with the remarkable story of its founder, Albert Contel, whose heritage is as rich and varied as the cultural tapestry of his native Barcelona. Raised in a home where economics and the arts danced in perfect harmony—an economist father and a polyglot mother—Albert grew up amid numbers and music, data and drama, forging an insatiable appetite for knowledge and a unique vision for its real-world application.
history.development: As a student, Albert worked afternoons in small accounting firms, grounding himself in bookkeeping, taxation and hands-on client service. This early stage paved the way to the 'big leagues,' where he served with the world’s most emblematic audit firms and top-tier international law offices. Here he honed the ability to navigate global finance, corporate and—especially—tax law, complemented by a stint in private banking that deepened his knowledge of corporate and personal finance.
history.birth: Albert’s true calling was not merely to work on the global stage, but to transform it. ELYSIUM was born from a dream, woven through years of experience and reflection, to create a firm that would lead with innovation and a holistic mindset.
history.values: The name ELYSIUM evokes the legendary Elysian Fields—an idyllic refuge for virtuous souls—which captures our mission. With the Möbius strip as our emblem, we pledge continuity, integrity and absolute transparency. Every client challenge becomes our own challenge; every victory, proof of our shared commitment. We aim not merely to solve problems but to anticipate and surpass expectations, spotting opportunities before they emerge. We strive to be unshakeable allies in our clients’ pursuit of success, ensuring that each one finds a sanctuary of trust and excellence within ELYSIUM. ELYSIUM is not just a firm; it is a movement, a revolution in consulting, and a legacy we intend for future generations. Our story is an open invitation to all who value excellence, passion and loyalty, and who wish to join us on this journey toward a future where the extraordinary is standard. With ELYSIUM you find not only solutions but an entirely new horizon of possibilities.

whatIsElysium.title: What is Elysium?
whatIsElysium.description: The name ELYSIUM evokes the legendary Elysian Fields—an idyllic refuge for virtuous souls—which captures our mission. With the Möbius strip as our emblem, we pledge continuity, integrity and absolute transparency.

list.name: Rooted in Latin and Ancient Greek, 'Elysium' references the Elysian Fields, symbolising our ideal in business: a sanctuary of trust and excellence where every client is treated with the highest professionalism and ethics.
list.slogan: 'Building Lasting Partnerships' encapsulates our customer-service philosophy: we build deep, enduring bonds founded on mutual trust and understanding.
list.symbol: The Möbius strip, with a single surface and edge, symbolises continuity and infinity—our vision for client relationships.
list.colours: Gold signifies excellence and success; Black denotes sophistication, elegance, strength and authority; White evokes clarity, purity and precision.

items.excellence: An unreserved commitment to surpassing expectations through innovative solutions and dedicated professionals.
items.honesty: Open, constant communication and full transparency as the foundation of lasting partnerships.
items.security: Safeguarding today and securing tomorrow by crafting robust, future-aligned strategies.
items.trust: The cornerstone of every relationship, evidenced by a 99% client-retention rate and frequent referrals.
